Functions

void miabot_waypoint (double *output, double *pose, double *waypoint, double k1, double k2)

Detailed Description

Implements functions for calculating low level miabot control independent of ROS library.

Definition in file dcsl_miabot_control_math.cc.

Function Documentation

void miabot_waypoint ( double *  output,
double *  pose,
double *  waypoint,
double  k1,
double  k2 
)

Control law to calculate desired velocity based on current position and desired position. This is a simple controller for differential-drive robots, as described by Brendan Andrade.

Parameters:
[out]output[v, omega]
[in]pose[x, y, theta]
[in]waypoint[x, y, theta]
[in]k1forward gain
[in]k2angular gain
